subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Lou Scalise Jr. and his father were among the Giant faithful at Lincoln Financial Field on Sept. 17. Scalise Jr. said they were “taunted, cursed and even spit at during the game by Eagles fans.”
snippet: Lou Scalise Jr. and his father were among the Giant faithful at Lincoln Financial Field on Sept. 17. Scalise Jr. said they were “taunted, cursed and even spit at during the game by Eagles fans.”
